title: Summer salad with pear, serrano ham and celeriac
directions: Preheat the oven to 220 Â° C. Peel the celeriac and cut the vegetables into cubes. Clean the orange, grate the orange peel and cut the fruit into wedges. Mix the rasp with the oil, pepper and salt. Spoon the celeriac. Divide the celeriac on a lined baking tray and bake for about 20 min. In the oven. Allow 10 minutes to cool..

Meanwhile, cut the bottom of the head romaine lettuce and cut the lettuce into pieces of 3 cm. Peel the pears into quarters, remove the cores and cut the pears into cubes. Heat a frying pan without oil or butter and roast the hazelnuts 3 min. On medium heat. Allow to cool on a plate. Chop coarsely. Divide the goat cheese into pieces.

Mix the salad with celeriac and pear spread between the plates and sprinkle with cheese. Roll the ham into florets, divide among the plates and sprinkle with the hazelnuts. Serve with orange wedges to squeeze over it.
